comment_0: This is my favortie Daddy Yankee song as well as my favorite Zion Y Lennox Song. It is a guy tellin how he is crazy for a girl but he is afraid to tell her. The beat by Luny Tunes is one of their best. This song got very good airplay in Latin America and is a huge Reggaeton hit,but no video was made. For anyone who has had that crush or maybe more than a crush,but hasnt gotten the courage to say anything,this is your song,Tu Principe or Your Prince.
comment_1: this song is really beautiful..i love the chorus.. aaawww to me is a sweet song i love it
